# VBL Core

The `vbl-core` repository ([Github link](https://github.com/dbirman/vbl-core)) is our shared asset storage across all of the VBL projects. 

**In `vbl-core`**: anything that is re-used across multiple projects
**Not in `vbl-core`**: project specific code, pilot code, backward-incompatible code

## Assets

### Materials

### Shaders

### Scripts
